name: drinks-review-system
description: A comprehensive platform for wine, cocktail, and spirit enthusiasts to discover, review, and share their experiences

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:api && npm run test:coverage:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:api && npm run lint:fix:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/api && npm install && cd ../web && npm install && cd ../../packages/database && npm install && cd ../types && npm install && cd ../utils && npm install
